long_description: When you want a skirt for travel or outdoorsy fun, yet want the added coverage of shorts, wear the Kuhl Mova Skort. The super-soft and stretchy skirt features attached mesh shorts underneath. Nylon/spandex skirt fabric is also durable and quick drying. Shorts are made from breathable, lightweight polyester mesh with a small envelope pocket to hold a key or cash. Easy pull-on style has a contoured waistband for comfort and an internal drawcord to adjust your fit. Kuhl Mova Skort features hand pockets, 2 back pockets and 1 snap-flap side pocket.
short_description: When you want a skirt for travel or outdoorsy fun, yet want the added coverage of shorts, wear the Kuhl Mova Skort. The super-soft and stretchy skirt features attached mesh shorts underneath.
